types:type.name: postcontactdata
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type postcontactdata = Array<{| firstName: String, lastName: String, email: String, phone: String|}> {"example": "[{\\\"firstName\\\":\\\"John\\\",\\\"lastName\\\":\\\"Doe\\\",\\\"email\\\":\\\"john.doe@example.com\\\",\\\"phone\\\":\\\"+1-555-555-5555\\\"}]"}

types:type.name: postaccountdata
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type postaccountdata = {| name: String, billingCity: String, billingCountry: String, billingPostalCode: String |} {"example": "{\\\"name\\\":\\\"Alejandro Payan\\\",\\\"billingCity\\\":\\\"San Luis\\\",\\\"billingCountry\\\":\\\"Mexico\\\",\\\"billingPostalCode\\\":\\\"82748\\\"}"}
